text: The 1915–16 Loyola Ramblers men's basketball team represents Loyola University Chicago during the 1915–16 college men's basketball season. The ramblers were led by first-year head coach Percy Moore. The team finished the season with an overall record of 10–3–1. ==Schedule== |- ==References== Category:Loyola Ramblers men's basketball seasons Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers Loyola Ramblers
